name: Funstable
description:
Oh no, your animals have unstabled themself and are now on the loose. You need to restable them, before they destabilize the surrounding ecosystem. Make use of your unstable tools which are sure to destabilize before you want them to. Don't forget to talk with the locals. They might know where your animals have gone, but some might be concidered unstable.

Controls:

Walking, Climbing - WASD / Arrowkeys

Talking, Collecting, Interacting - Spacebar

If in a buildable area buildables can be clicked, then placed in the world with the mouse.
